## introspect() function

Performs type inference and stats on a table/columns.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function introspect(table: ColumnTable, detailed?: boolean, 
columns?: string[]): TableMetadata;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable |  |
|  detailed | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> include detailed per-column stats, otherwise just basic types |
|  columns | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TableMetadata](./tables.tablemetadata.md)
